Package cams.repliable

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
cams.repliable.Repliable
cams.repliable.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Repliable
The Suggestion represents a suggestion made by a camp committee member. It inherits the basic functionalities of Repliable. Each suggestion has a suggestion content and can be approved by the staff in charge of the camp. The camp committee member is associated with this suggestion.
Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen
